nodes.text: A battle took place on the planet Garos IV in the first year of the Clone Wars. The Confederacy of Independent Systems was victorious over the forces of the Galactic Republic in the fight. The loss of Garos IV, together with other defeats, led Jedi Grand Master Yoda to believe that the Republic would need another victory.
The battle was first mentioned in the novel The Clone Wars: Wild Space (2008). Wild Space was written by Karen Miller.
